name: Dragon, Sand Ancient
movement: walking speed of 40 feet, burrowing speed of 40 feet, and flying speed of 80 feet
description: A gargantuan dragon infused with elemental sand, embodying a formidable stature and a fearsome presence in battle.
memorable: Incredibly resilient with a breathe weapon that can cause blindness or exhaustion, instilling fear with its presence.
goals: To dominate its territory and instill fear in any intruders.
relations: Could be served by lesser sand elementals or similar creatures, often found in arid regions.
environment: Usually found in sandy or desert-like environments.
strengths: Exceptional durability and access to debilitation effects through its abilities.
weaknesses: Average dexterity and potential vulnerabilities to particular magical effects.
attacks: Multiattack with a fear-inducing presence, biting and slashing with claws and tail.
most_powerful_ability: Breath weapon that inflicts significant piercing damage and fire damage, with the potential to blind or exhaust enemies.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet and a remarkably high passive perception of 31.
skills: Proficient in perception, enhancing its awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Uses legendary resistance to overcome failed saves.
Can camouflage itself in sandy environments for ambush tactics.
Requires only half the food and drink of a typical dragon of its size.
test_queries: formidable sandy dragon with blindness breath weapon
gargantuan dragon in desert using frightful presence
sand ancient dragon with legendary resistance abilities
powerful dragon that blinds and exhausts enemies
dragon with unique elemental traits and camouflage
